content: Alliance of Asian newspapers **Asia News Network** (**ANN**) is a news coalition of 24 news organisations from various Asian countries. Headquartered in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), it was established in 1999 to form an alliance and enhance co-operation among the various news organisations and their respective journalists and newspapers. Through the coalition, members pool resources and expertise to offer in-depth coverage of regional and international issues by presenting local viewpoints on complex topics. Most newspapers in this coalition are also the [newspaper of record](/wiki/Newspaper_of_record) in their respective countries. Asia News Network once had a weekly news magazine which started in 2006. ## Members Asia News Network members consist of the following publications: - *[The Straits Times](/wiki/The_Straits_Times)* - *[The Korea Herald](/wiki/The_Korea_Herald)* - *[China Daily](/wiki/China_Daily)* - *Gogo Mongolia* - *[The Japan News](/wiki/The_Japan_News)* - *[Dawn](/wiki/Dawn_(newspaper))* - *[The Statesman](/wiki/The_Statesman_(India))* - *[The Island](/wiki/The_Island_(Sri_Lanka))* - *[Kuensel](/wiki/Kuensel)* - *[Kathmandu Post](/wiki/Kathmandu_Post)* - *[Daily Star](/wiki/The_Daily_Star_(Bangladesh))* - *[Eleven Media](/wiki/Eleven_Media_Group)* - *[The Nation](/wiki/The_Nation_(Thailand))* - *[The Jakarta Post](/wiki/The_Jakarta_Post)* - *[The Star](/wiki/The_Star_(Malaysia))* - *[Sin Chew Daily](/wiki/Sin_Chew_Daily)* - *[Phnom Penh Post](/wiki/Phnom_Penh_Post)* - *[Rasmei Kampuchea](/wiki/Rasmei_Kampuchea)* - *[The Borneo Bulletin](/wiki/The_Borneo_Bulletin)* - *[Vietnam News](/wiki/Vietnam_News)* - *[Philippine Daily Inquirer](/wiki/Philippine_Daily_Inquirer)* - *[Vientiane Times](/wiki/Vientiane_Times)* - Asia portal - Singapore portal - [European Dailies Alliance](/wiki/European_Dailies_Alliance) - [Leading European Newspaper Alliance](/wiki/Leading_European_Newspaper_Alliance) - [Grupo de Diarios Am√©rica](/wiki/Grupo_de_Diarios_Am%C3%A9rica) - [Latin American Newspaper Association](/wiki/Latin_American_Newspaper_Association) - Asia News Network
title: Asia News Network
